hello every one,
i'm new in using junit.
i have created a class in which there are around 10 test methods(test 
cases), and when i'm running it,it will run the whole class. 
is there any way, so that i can run only 1 method at a time(or 
selected no. of methods)?, i require this for debugging my code.
and i want to use gui version of the junit, not txt format.

thanks
faiya
